original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 326.85/327.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 326.85/327.00 to the US dollar on Monday, from 326.90/327.10 on Friday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 13.72/78 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026, was quoted at 13.65/70 percent from 13.70/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 13.65/75 percent from 13.70/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 13.95/14.00 percent from 13.90/14.00 percent.
The CSE opened down, with the ASPI down 0.08 percent at 10,733, and the S&P SL20 down 0.13 percent at 3,098 in the first hour of trading. (Colombo/Dec18/2023)
